item.title:
RT by @IsraelMFA: Minister @prevotmaxime,
You are denying consular services to Belgian Jews residin...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @IsraelMFA

RT by @IsraelMFA: Minister @prevotmaxime, You are denying consular services to Belgian Jews residing in Judea, Samaria, and East Jerusalem, while not applying the same measures to Belgian citizens living in any other disputed or occupied territories. Have you applied the same measures in Northern Cyprus (which is EU territory!), Western Sahara, or Nagorno-Karabakh? You have not. Your sanction is entirely discriminatory, even illegal.
